headline: Can Analyst Optimism on EQT’s (EQT) Operational Efficiency Redefine Its Investment Case?
summary: Earlier this month, several analysts initiated or reiterated positive coverage on EQT, emphasizing its low-cost structure, infrastructure strengths, and financial flexibility following the sale of logistics assets and a public offering of Waystar shares. This wave of analyst sentiment highlights expectations for robust free cash flow, supported by EQT’s operational efficiency and exposure to potential gains in natural gas prices. Next, we'll assess how analyst enthusiasm for EQT’s...

headline: EQT Valuation in Focus as Utilities Ramp Up for AI-Driven Energy Demand and Infrastructure Upgrades
summary: Amid a fresh wave of investment aimed at upgrading the U.S. energy infrastructure, EQT (EQT) is among the firms drawing investor attention as utilities prepare for increased demand driven by artificial intelligence and data center growth. See our latest analysis for EQT. Momentum around EQT has been picking up, with the share price delivering a 12.5% gain year-to-date and a striking 48.8% total shareholder return over the past year. While short-term volatility has crept in, longer-term gains...
